entry.title: Binary Exploitation Vs Reverse Engineering
entry.summary: Hey Guys, Let’s start with some basics. Binary exploitation and reverse engineering might sound confusing sometimes. Consider you have a Milkshake and you have to identify the ingredients. We can guess it by the colour and the taste. Basically, in the milkshake, milk and the sugar are common so we only will have to identify fruit. That’s reverse engineering. Talking in the computer terms, gu...

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Hello Everyone, This is the first blog on this website. The reason behind this initiative is to help people who are struggling in the cybersecurity domain. There are many courses and tutorials both paid and free. Some of them are doing a great job and some of them are just looting people. This website will provide knowledge related to security domain free of cost in as simple words as possibl...
